author: Waniya Malik
title: Apple launches a gold strap for your Apple Watch: the price? Better not to know
text:
One of the straps that we had seen at the presentation of the Apple Watch Series 10 has been officially launched yesterday. It is a gold strap in the two available sizes, 42 and 46 mm, which we can purchase starting today.
It works, like the rest, for other watch models, not only with the latest one, however, what you may not like so much is the price, since it will cost as much or more than some Apple Watch models so it is not intended for all audiences.
Gold strap for Apple Watch The design would be made up of links, made of 316L stainless steel, so let‚Äôs not think that it is solid gold, something impossible in a strap of that weight, since it would be much more expensive, and even more so now, at the price of gold.
Currently, we can find it for 349 euros in Spain, the cost in the United States being $349, so at least, in exchange, it is not worth more, as usually happens. However, even though we pay for it today, we will not receive it until the first week of December, so we would have to wait a little, and this type of accessories, so expensive and exclusive, are not in very high demand, and Therefore, not a manufacturing one either, so if you want one, at least before Christmas, you should order it, as the delivery date could go up.
It has a 3-year warranty, although if it receives a blow or breaks, you will not be eligible for this, so you will have to be careful, since we are not talking about a normal strap.
There are quite similar imitations on Amazon. I, personally, have a similar one, and we can get it for just over 20 euros, so if you simply like the design, but don‚Äôt want to pay that much for it, it is an option to consider.
In the same launch, we have two other models, or rather, colors, since the material, as we said, is simulation. We would talk about ‚ÄúSlate‚Äù and ‚ÄúNatural‚Äù. Of course, at the same price as Gold.
The link bracelet is made of 316L stainless steel alloy and has more than 100 pieces. Its manufacturing process is so meticulous that it takes almost nine hours to cut the links for a single bracelet. The folding clasp blends with the curves of the design. And if you want to add or remove links, no problem: many have a button to release them without the need for special tools.
As we can see, the price is not given by its material itself, but by the process and labor behind each one of them, so now it is your decision if you really want to pay that much for one, or prefer Go for the imitations from Amazon, which, honestly, are very good.
Leave us a comment with your opinion about this product, and if you have considered purchasing it, or think it is crazy to pay so much for a simple strap.
The entry Apple launches a gold strap for your Apple Watch: the price? Better not to know was published first in La Manzana Mordida.

author: streiff
title: CNN's Brianna Keilar: JD Vance Is an 'Imperfect Messenger' As His Service in Iraq Is Not Really Combat
text: The evidence against the pro-abort, anti-gun, and anti-courage Democrat nominee for vice president, Minnesota Governor Tim Walz, is overwhelming. When faced with the possibility of deploying to Iraq as the senior noncommissioned officer in his artillery battalion, Walz hastily retired and took a one-rank demotion rather than go. He did this despite his campaign announcing that he would deploy to Iraq when the mobilization of his battalion was made public. This announcement was made even though Walz had already submitted his request to retire before his enlistment had expired; he was two years short of meeting that obligation. Since that time, he has given at least one interview that indicates he told a journalist that he had served in Iraq and is on video claiming to have been in combat. You can follow the whole story at these links. BACKGROUND: [UPDATED: MN Gov. Tim Walz Accused of Cowardice and Embellishment of Army Service Record by Former Peers ‚Äì RedState](https://redstate.com/mdempsey/2024/08/06/minnesota-gov-tim-walz-accused-of-cowardice-and-embellishment-of-army-service-record-by-former-peers-n2177798) [A Tale of Two Veterans: What the Service of Walz and Vance Tells Us About the Men ‚Äì RedState](https://redstate.com/streiff/2024/08/06/a-tale-of-two-veterans-what-the-service-of-walz-and-vance-tells-us-about-the-men-n2177817) [Tim Walz Goes Full Metal Stolen Valor in Anti-Gun Rant ‚Äì RedState](https://redstate.com/streiff/2024/08/07/tim-walz-goes-full-metal-stolen-valor-in-anti-gun-rant-n2177841) [As Walz's Military Record Combusts Under Casual Scrutiny, the Left Goes for Whataboutism ‚Äì RedState](https://redstate.com/streiff/2024/08/07/as-walzs-military-record-combusts-under-casual-scrutiny-the-left-goes-for-whataboutism-n2177860) [JD Vance Rightly Calls Tim Walz Out for Being a Sheep and a Coward ‚Äì RedState](https://redstate.com/mdempsey/2024/08/07/jd-vance-rightly-calls-out-tim-walz-for-being-a-coward-so-should-you-n2177847) [VA Senate Candidate and Navy Combat Veteran Hung Cao Weighs In on Kamala's VP Pick, Stolen Valor Tim Walz ‚Äì RedState](https://redstate.com/jenniferoo/2024/08/07/va-congressional-candidate-and-navy-combat-veteran-hung-cao-weighs-in-on-stolen-valor-tim-walz-n2177865) [Tim Walz's Campaign Claimed He Was Going to Iraq Even As He Was in the Process of Deserting His Men](https://redstate.com/streiff/2024/08/08/tim-walzs-campaign-claimed-he-was-going-to-iraq-even-as-he-was-in-the-process-of-deserting-his-men-n2177883) [Bloomberg News Gets Caught Delivering Dems' False, Favorable Account of Tim Walz' War Record](https://redstate.com/bradslager/2024/08/08/bloomberg-news-hurt-by-its-democrat-party-overwatch-the-tim-walz-war-record-is-a-journalistic-minefield-n2177900) As I point out in [As Walz's Military Record Combusts Under Casual Scrutiny, the Left Goes for Whataboutism](https://redstate.com/streiff/2024/08/07/as-walzs-military-record-combusts-under-casual-scrutiny-the-left-goes-for-whataboutism-n2177860), the media has resorted to running interference for Walz. That interference has gone from trying to defend the indefensible to claiming that JD Vance serving as a Marine Corps public affairs specialist in Anbar Province, Iraq, doesn't really count as combat. Here is CNN's noxious Brianna Kielar floating that trial balloon. I also think that JD Vance, as a messenger on this, may be an imperfect messenger. Because we have, as you introduced him as a combat correspondent which is what his title was. But when you dig a little deeper into that, he was a public affairs specialist. Someone who did not see combat, but certainly the title combat correspondent tends to give you a different impression. So he may be the imperfect messenger on this. Vance [responded](https://x.com/JDVance/status/1821605143689019589). Brianna this is disgusting, and you and your entire network should be ashamed of yourselves. When I got the call to go to Iraq, I went. Tim Walz said he carried a gun in a war. Did he? No. It was a lie. Kielar's statement is the worst sort of dishonesty. Vance served in Anbar Province for six months in " [late 2005.](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/JD_Vance#Early_life_and_education)" During [2005](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Anbar_campaign_(2003%E2%80%932011)#2005), Anbar was ground zero for Iraqi insurgent activity. Kielar says that being a combat correspondent makes you an "imperfect messenger" for criticizing someone who abandoned their soldiers as they were preparing to deploy. If you served in Iraq or Afghanistan, you were in combat. Suicide bombers, insider attacks, and rockets and mortar rounds hit Forward Operating Bases. The largest one-day loss in CIA history took place at the [Camp Chapman attack](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Camp_Chapman_attack) in Afghanistan when a suicide bomber killed ten people and seriously wounded six. By Kielar's metric, none of those people were actually in combat because they were safe and sound on a defended base. Just because you were a public affairs specialist doesn't mean you weren't in [danger](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/JD_Vance#Early_life_and_education). McClung, who was 34 at the time of her death, was serving as a media relations officer when a roadside bomb killed her instantly in Ramadi, Iraq, Dec. 6, 2006. She and two other service members assigned the Army‚Äôs Brigade Combat Team, Capt. Travis Patriquin and Spec. Vincent Pomante, III, were also killed. The convoy McClung had been riding in was escorting Newsweek journalists when an improvised explosive device struck their vehicle. The Newsweek journalists were in another vehicle and escaped without injury. McClung had been escorting retired Marine Lt. Col. Oliver North and a Fox News Channel camera crew earlier in the day and were devastated when they learned the news of the attack. More to the point, whether Vance served in combat or even served at all is immaterial. Walz connived to retire two years before he should have. He started the retirement process after discovering his unit was going to Iraq. His campaign announced less than two months before Walz took a demotion and retired that he was deploying with his battalion. Anyone who did not abandon their troops as they were heading into combat is a perfect messenger for the story on Walz.

author: H., de Miguel
title: La AEMET actualiza su previsi√≥n para Semana Santa: baj√≥n brusco de temperaturas y lluvias a partir de este d√≠a
text:
Secci√≥n patrocinada por
Noticias destacadas
El tiempo
La AEMET actualiza su previsi√≥n para Semana Santa: baj√≥n brusco de temperaturas y lluvias a partir de este d√≠a
El tiempo inestable podr√≠a afectar a las vacaciones. ¬øD√≥nde har√° m√°s calor y d√≥nde llover√° m√°s en Semana Santa?
El
tiempo de esta Semana Santa ser√° variable y con tendencia a la inestabilidad. Comenzar√° con sol y temperaturas suaves en amplias zonas; continuar√° con fr√≠o, lluvias casi generalizadas y nieve en las monta√±as, y podr√≠a acabar lluviosa en la mayor parte de la pen√≠nsula y Canarias, seg√∫n la predicci√≥n especial de la Agencia Estatal de Meteorolog√≠a (AEMET) para el periodo vacacional. Como explica el organismo, la previsi√≥n se ir√° actualizando diariamente hasta el pr√≥ximo S√°bado Santo, 30 de marzo.
Este viernes, d√≠a de inicio de las vacaciones para muchos ciudadanos, el tiempo ser√° estable en la mayor parte de Espa√±a y los term√≥metros volver√°n a marcar m√°s de 30 grados en zonas del sur peninsular. Las temperaturas descender√°n en el Cant√°brico, el norte de Galicia y Canarias; se mantendr√°n en los Pirineos y subir√°n en el resto del pa√≠s. Los term√≥metros marcar√°n al menos 25 grados en 29 capitales de provincia, con los valores m√°s altos en C√≥rdoba, Huelva y Sevilla (30); Badajoz y Ja√©n (29), y Almer√≠a y Ciudad Real (28). En cambio, suavizar√° en Santander (15), Oviedo (16) y San Sebasti√°n (17). .
El cielo soleado se impondr√° en muchas zonas de Espa√±a, con algunas excepciones. La DANA que afect√≥ el mi√©rcoles y el jueves a la pen√≠nsula tender√° a acercarse a las Islas Canarias, donde dejar√° precipitaciones intensas desde este viernes y durante todo el fin de semana. Los chubascos podr√≠an afectar a todo el archipi√©lago, ser√°n m√°s intensos en el norte de las islas, con alguna tormenta ocasional, y podr√°n ser localmente fuertes en las de mayor relieve. Adem√°s, la cota de nieve estar√° en 1800/2200 metros en las islas occidentales.
En cuanto al resto del pa√≠s, se esperan nubes en el norte de Galicia y el √°rea cant√°brica, que tambi√©n se esperan por la ma√±ana en zonas pr√≥ximas al sur por la ma√±ana y tambi√©n al final del d√≠a por el acercamiento de un frente fr√≠o, que dejar√° lluvias desplaz√°ndose de oeste a este. Asimismo, es probable que en los principales sistemas monta√±osos se desarrolle nubosidad de evoluci√≥n, con chubascos aislados o tormentas ocasionales. Continuar√° la calima en la pen√≠nsula y Baleares, con lo que llover√° barro all√° donde aparezcan precipitaciones, y surgir√°n brumas y nieblas matinales en el extremo norte peninsular, el sur de la Comunidad Valenciana y Baleares.
Durante el fin de semana se impondr√° el tiempo estable. Se esperan cielos con intervalos de nubes medias y altas, excepto en el Cant√°brico, donde los cielos permanecer√°n cubiertos de nubes bajas, con probables precipitaciones d√©biles el s√°bado. Habr√° nubosidad de evoluci√≥n diurna en los sistemas monta√±osos, que podr√≠a dar lugar a chubascos o tormentas aisladas. Las temperaturas descender√°n al resto de la mitad norte y el domingo a la vertiente mediterr√°nea.
La DANA dejar√° precipitaciones intensas en Canarias. El s√°bado ser√° el d√≠a m√°s adverso, con chubascos generalizados, acompa√±ados de tormenta, que ser√°n m√°s probables, intensos y persistentes en el norte de las islas monta√±osas. Se espera que vayan extendi√©ndose de oeste a este durante ese d√≠a, sin descartar granizo de forma ocasional y con cotas de nieve en torno a 2.000-2.200 metros. El domingo todav√≠a continuar√° la inestabilidad, aunque es probable que la DANA comience a alejarse de las islas, por lo que se espera que los chubascos sean menos intensos que el d√≠a anterior.
Entre el lunes y el Mi√©rcoles Santo se abre un escenario m√°s incierto. No obstante, el comunicado de la AEMET recoge que "el escenario m√°s probable contempla la penetraci√≥n de sucesivos frentes, lo que dejar√≠a cielos nubosos y precipitaciones abundantes y generalizadas en la Pen√≠nsula y Baleares". La cota de nieve descender√≠a bruscamente a partir de la tarde del lunes hasta entre 800 y 1.000 metros, con lo que nevar√° en los principales sistemas monta√±osos, sin descartarse en zonas aleda√±as.
Es probable que las temperaturas desciendan de forma acusada el lunes y el martes, cuando se esperan heladas nocturnas en los sistemas monta√±osos y p√°ramos de la mitad norte. Canarias continuar√≠a con inestabilidad, pues seguir√≠an los cielos nubosos y las precipitaciones, m√°s probables en el norte de las islas, sin descartar que se extiendan el martes a puntos del sur, cuando bajar√≠an las temperaturas.
Con un cierto grado de incertidumbre, es probable que entre el Jueves Santo y el S√°bado Santo contin√∫e el tiempo inestable en la pen√≠nsula, con el paso de sucesivos frentes que dejar√≠an cielos nubosos y precipitaciones generalizadas, menos probables en la vertiente mediterr√°nea y m√°s abundantes en la vertiente atl√°ntica. Las nevadas quedar√≠an restringidas a zonas de monta√±a y las temperaturas tender√≠an a recuperarse. En Canarias es probable que esos d√≠as contin√∫en los cielos nubosos y las precipitaciones, m√°s probables en la mitad occidental y en el norte de las islas, con temperaturas con pocos cambios.

author: Jon "Sikamikanico" Clarke
title: Hazelight teases new IP, ‚ÄòIt Takes Two‚Äô breaks sales milestone
text:
It Takes Two was one of my favourite games back in 2021, and probably one of the best co-op games of all time. Turns out a lot of folks agreed, as it won Game of the Year at the Keighly‚Äôs ‚Äì I mean, The Game Awards.
https://twitter.com/HazelightGames/status/1846588233573937193 Now, years later, the game has broken a new milestone, with over 20 Million copies sold, which is pretty incredible. Writing on X (Formely Twitter) Hazelight Studios shared the following message :
‚Äú It Takes Two HAS SOLD OVER 20 MILLION!!! You‚Äôre the best fans in the world, how you have embraced our game is blowing our minds! We‚Äôre so grateful to every one of the millions upon millions who have enjoyed their time with Cody and May. ‚Äú
If you haven‚Äôt played it, you can check out our review here :
Hazelight Teases New IP The game was released in partnership with Electronic Arts and their EA Originals label, and it seems that partnership is about to bear new fruit, because now Hazelight are teasing a new IP .
https://twitter.com/HazelightGames/status/1846929745016987890 There are plenty of clues in the image above, and it seems we‚Äôre definitely in for another co-operatively focused titles from Hazelight. Those hoping for a sequel, perhaps ‚ÄòIt Takes Three‚Äô look like they‚Äôre going to be left wanting.
Either way, we can‚Äôt wait to see what Hazelight and EA Originals have in store for us.

author: Redazione Cronaca
title: Meteo in Toscana: allerta gialla per temporali nella giornata di sabato, possibili grandinate | Corriere.it
text:

Meteo in Toscana: allerta gialla per temporali nella giornata di sabato, possibili grandinate di Redazione Cronaca Prevista diminuzione delle temperature, ma di breve durata
üå© √à stata emessa un' allerta gialla dalla sala operativa regionale della Protezione civile per temporali forti sulle aree interne della Toscana nella giornata di sabato 3 agosto dalle 11 alle 18.
Possibili temporali sparsi dalla tarda mattina e primo pomeriggio in trasferimento dalle zone orientali verso quelle occidentali. Cumulati medi in genere non significativi e massimi puntuali fino a localmente elevati, pi√π probabili nelle zone interne e montuose. Possibilit√† di colpi di vento e grandinate .
√à prevista una diminuzione delle temperature , ma di breve durata.
